summary: Cheat perk to be a god of thievery (sneak, lockpicking, pickpocket)
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]This is a cheat mod.[/size][/b]

Adds a perk to the game that gives your character godly stealth buffs. I didn't include it in the world because it's a cheat mod.
To get the perk you need to add it by console. To find the ID of the perk you can type [b]help "cray"[/b] and then use [b]player.addperk <ID>[/b]
to add the perk to your character.

Note: You won't see any stat changes but you will notice your skills at sneaking, lockpicking and pickpocket.

Please report bugs and do not forget: This is a cheat mod.

v1.1 : Archive of v1.0 had an invalid structure, I fixed it.
author: cray935
